name: Clonazepam
contraindications: clonazepam available tablet . tablets administered water swallowing tablet whole .
warningsAndPrecautions: clonazepam tablets usp 2 mg white white , round , flat faced , beveled edge tablets debossed “ c 2 ” one side plain . supplied follows : ndc : 70518-2232-00 ndc : 70518-2232-01 packaging : 100 1 box packaging : 1 1 pouch store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] . repackaged distributed : remedy repack , inc. 625 kolter dr. suite # 4 indiana , pa 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions: clonazepam tablets contraindicated patients following conditions : history sensitivity benzodiazepines biochemical evidence significant liver disease acute narrow angle glaucoma ( may used patients open angle glaucoma receiving appropriate therapy ) .
contraindications_original: Clonazepam is available as a tablet. The tablets should be administered with water by swallowing the tablet whole.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clonazepam tablets USP 2 mg are white to off white, round, flat faced, beveled edge tablets debossed with “C 2” on one side and plain on the other. They are supplied as follows:
                  NDC: 70518-2232-00
                  NDC: 70518-2232-01
                  PACKAGING: 100 in 1 BOX
                  PACKAGING: 1 in 1 POUCH
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
adverseReactions_original:
Clonazepam tablets are contraindicated in patients with the following conditions:
                  
                     History of sensitivity to benzodiazepines
                     Clinical or biochemical evidence of significant liver disease
                     Acute narrow angle glaucoma (it may be used in patients with open angle glaucoma who are receiving appropriate therapy).
